sentence.Network_en: Now simply close the wire lock and you have a very durable, totally weedless tube bait.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在关闭导线锁,并且你有一个非常耐久, 完全无杂草的管诱饵.

sentence.Network_en: Vulcanic lake, the dead sea: no fish, weedless, sunk deep in the earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 火山湖, 死海.没有鱼, 也不见杂草, 深深地陷进地里.
